text: Jan 12 Energy stocks helped Canadas main stock index open higher on Tuesday, as oil prices hit an 11-month high on tighter supply and hopes of a drop in U.S. stockpile.* At 9:30 a.m. ET (14:30 GMT), the Toronto Stock Exchanges S&P/TSX composite index was up 32.5 points, or 0.18%, at 17,966.95.
